text: The Sestra () is a river in Moscow Oblast, Russia. It is a left tributary of the Dubna (Volga basin). Its source is the Senezh Lake. The length of the river is . The area of its basin is .«Река Сестра», Russian State Water Registry The river freezes in November to early January and stays under the ice until late March or April. Its main tributary is the Yakhroma. The town of Klin is located on the Sestra. == References == Category:Rivers of Moscow Oblast
title: Sestra (Moscow Oblast)
